description: Provides financial assistance for house construction.

procedures.step_description: Eligible individuals can apply using the prescribed form.
Required documents include annual income certificate, caste certificate, Himachali certificate issued by Executive Magistrate, land ownership document, and Gram Sabha resolution.

title: स्वर्ण जयंती आश्रय योजना (Swaran Jayanti Ashray Yojna)

criteria.description: Permanent resident of Himachal Pradesh
Annual income not exceeding ₹50,000
Ownership of land for house construction
No existing house ownership

description: This scheme aims to provide training and proficiency in computer applications and allied activities to candidates belonging to Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe/Other Backward Classes, Minorities, Persons with Disabilities, Widows, and Single Women.  The training will be imparted by recognized institutions for a duration of one year, enabling them to become employable in government/private sectors.

procedures.step_description: Candidate needs to apply to the concerned District Welfare Officer along with required documents within 30 days of advertisement in newspapers.

funding_pattern: Training fees up to Rs. 1350/- per month (Rs. 1500/- for Person with Disabilities). Stipend of Rs. 1000/- per month during training (Rs. 1200/- per month for Person with Disabilities). Stipend of Rs. 1500/- per month for 6 months post-training during proficiency period (Rs. 1800/- per month for Person with Disabilities).
title: Training and Proficiency in Computer Applications & allied activities to the candidates belonging to Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe/Other Backward Classes and Minorities /Single Woman/Widow & Person with Disabilities

criteria.description: Applicant must be a permanent resident of Himachal Pradesh.
Applicant must belong to Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe/Other Backward Classes and Minorities.
Applicant's age must be between 18 and 35 years.
Applicant must belong to a BPL family. In case of non-availability of BPL candidates, those with an annual family income less than Rs. 2,00,000/- will be eligible.
Applicant must possess the minimum educational qualification prescribed for computer training.

description: Provides a financial reward to couples where one partner belongs to a Scheduled Caste and the other belongs to a different caste.

procedures.step_description: Apply through the concerned Panchayat/Municipalities along with the required documents.

funding_pattern: INR 50,000 or the amount fixed by the government from time to time.
title: अंतरजातीय विवाह पुरस्कार (Award for Inter-Caste Marriage Award)
documents: Himachali Bonafide Certificate issued by Executive Magistrate

criteria.description: Applicant must be a permanent resident of Himachal Pradesh.
The couple should not be older than 50 years.
Marriage should be registered under the relevant Act/Rules.
The applicant should not have previously received this award.

description: Provides relief and compensation to individuals belonging to Scheduled Castes (SCs) and Scheduled Tribes (STs) who are victims of atrocities.

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Individuals belonging to Scheduled Castes (SCs) and Scheduled Tribes (STs) who are victims of atrocities.

procedures.step_description: Immediately after the incident, the affected/victim person must file a First Information Report (FIR) at any police station.
The district administration provides relief amount upon receiving the FIR from the police.

title: Compensation to victims of atrocities belonging to SCs/STs

criteria.description: The victim must belong to a Scheduled Caste (SC) or Scheduled Tribe (ST).
The victim must have suffered atrocities due to caste discrimination.
A case must be registered with the police under Section 3 of the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act, 1989.

description: अनुसूचित जाति एवं अनुसूचित जनजाति के परिवारों की आर्थिक स्थिति में सुधार लाने हेतु उनके कारोबार को बढ़ाने तथा अन्य स्वयं रोजगार धन्घे स्थापित करने हेतु प्रशिक्षण तथा ऋण उपलब्ध करवाना।

procedures.step_description: पात्र व्यक्ति निर्धारित प्रपत्र पर आवेदन कर सकता है, जिसके साथ वार्षिक आय प्रमाण-पत्र, जाति प्रमाण पत्र, हिमाचली प्रमाण पत्रा कार्यकारी दण्डाधिकारी से जारी किया गया हो तथा जिस भूमि पर मकान बनाना प्रस्तावित है की जमाबन्दी नकल व ततीमा प्रस्तुत करना अनिवार्य है व ग्राम सभा का प्रस्ताव।

title: हिमाचल प्रदेश अनुसूचित जाति/जन जाति विकास निगम की योजनाएं (Schemes of H.P. Scheduled Castes/ Scheduled Tribes Development Corporation)

criteria.description: पात्र व्यक्ति को अपना आवेदन निर्धारित प्रपत्र पर जाति प्रमाण पत्र, हिमाचली प्रमाण पत्र जो कार्यकारी दण्डाधिकारी सेे जारी किया हो, सहित प्रस्तुत करना अनिवार्य है।

description: This scheme aims to uplift the social, educational, and economic status of individuals belonging to Scheduled Backward Classes living below the poverty line. It provides loans for various projects in agriculture, handicrafts, traditional occupations, small and cottage industries, transport services, etc., at interest rates of 6% for loans up to ₹5 lakh and 7% for loans above ₹5 lakh. Under the Swarna Jayanti Swarojgar Yojana, women from backward classes living below the poverty line can avail loans for self-employment at a 5% interest rate. Interest-free loans up to ₹75,000 are provided for higher education to students whose family income is less than ₹98,000. Loans up to ₹5 lakh are available for technical and vocational education at 4% interest for boys and 3.5% for girls.

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Individuals below the poverty line belonging to Scheduled Backward Classes

procedures.step_description: Submit the application form along with the required documents.

title: Schemes of H.P. Backward Classes Finance & Develpoment Corporation

criteria.description: Age between 18 and 55 years.
Belonging to Scheduled Backward Classes.
Annual income less than ₹98,000 for rural areas and ₹1,20,000 for urban areas.

documents: Domicile Certificate issued by Executive Magistrate

description: This scheme aims to uplift the socio-economic status of minorities in Himachal Pradesh living below the poverty line by providing financial assistance for self-employment and professional/technical education.

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Individuals belonging to minority communities (Sikh, Muslim, Christian, Buddhist, Jain, and Parsi)

procedures.step_description: Eligible individuals need to submit an application in the prescribed format along with required documents to the concerned authorities.

sponsors.sponsor_type: Himachal Pradesh Minorities Finance & Development Corporation

funding_pattern: Loans up to Rs. 5 lakhs at 6% interest for 5 years for self-employment. Loans up to Rs. 10 lakhs at 3% interest for professional/technical education (JBT, Nursing, Hotel Management, MBA, MBBS, Engineering, LLB, B.Ed, etc.).
title: हिमाचल प्रदेश अल्प संख्यक वित्त एवं विकास निगम की योजनाएं(Schemes of H.P. Minorities Finance & Development Corporation)
documents: Domicile certificate issued by Executive Magistrate

criteria.description: Age between 18 and 55 years.
Annual income less than Rs. 98,000 (rural areas) or Rs. 1,20,000 (urban areas).

description: Provides assistance and support to Other Backward Classes in Himachal Pradesh.
title: हिमाचल प्रदेश अन्य पिछड़ा वर्ग आयोग (H.P. Backward Classes Commission)
